Package com.hotel.system

Class CreditCard

java.lang.Object
com.hotel.system.CreditCard
public class CreditCard extends Object
Represents the class of CreditCard, which allows a user to input a guest's credit card details
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vignesh Ezhil

  • Constructor Details

    • CreditCard

      public CreditCard(String guestID, String Name, String CardNo, String expiry, String CVV, CreditCardType cardType)
      Constructor for CreditCard object
      Parameters:
      guestID - ID number of the Guest
      Name - Name of Guest who owns the CreditCard
      CardNo - Card Number to uniquely identify the CreditCard
      expiry - Expiry date of the card
      CVV - Security number for the card
      cardType - Type of card (VISA, MASTERCARD, AMEX)
